text: First, ex - Mouseketeer Britney Spears posed in short shorts and a black bra on a Rolling Stone cover in 1999. Then, a scantily clad onetime Hannah Montana, Miley Cyrus, twerked up a storm at the MTV VMAs two years ago. Now, it ’ s former Disney star Selena Gomez, 23, who ’ s shed most of her clothing as part of an attempt to establish herself as a grown - up artist. All eyes are on her new album, “ Revival ” ( her first for Interscope ), out Friday — or, more accurately, all eyes are on her album cover.
